orestes.bloomfilter

类 CountingBloomFilter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • orestes.bloomfilter.BloomFilter<T>
      • orestes.bloomfilter.CountingBloomFilter<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    直接已知子类:
    CountingBloomFilterMemory, CountingBloomFilterRedis

    public abstract class CountingBloomFilter<T>
extends BloomFilter<T>
    Represents a Counting Bloom Filter, which in contrast to a normal Bloom filter also allow removal.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCountingBits

        public int getCountingBits()
        返回:
        the number of bits used for counting

      • add

        public boolean add(byte[] element)
        从类复制的说明: BloomFilter
        Adds the passed value to the filter.
        指定者:
        add 在类中 BloomFilter<T>
        参数:
        element - value to add
        返回:
        true if the value did not previously exist in the filter. Note, that a false positive may occur, thus the value may not have already been in the filter, but it hashed to a set of bits already in the filter.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(byte[] element)
        Removes the object from the counting bloom filter.
        参数:
        element - object to be deleted
        返回:
        true if the element is not present after removal

      • remove

        public boolean remove(T element)
        Removes the object from the counting bloom filter.
        参数:
        element - object to be deleted
        返回:
        true if the element is not present after removal

      • removeAll

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> removeAll(java.util.Collection<T> elements)
        Removes the objects from the counting bloom filter.
        参数:
        elements - objects to be deleted
        返回:
        a list of booleans indicating for each element, whether it was removed

      • getEstimatedCount

        public abstract long getEstimatedCount(T element)
        Return the estimated count for an element using the Mininum Selection algorithm (i.e. by choosing the minimum counter for the given element). This estimation is biased, as it doest not consider how full the filter is, but performs best in practice. The underlying theoretical foundation are spectral Bloom filters, see: http://theory.stanford.edu/~matias/papers/sbf_thesis.pdf
        参数:
        element - element to query
        返回:
        estimated count of the element

      • addAndEstimateCount

        public abstract long addAndEstimateCount(byte[] element)
        Adds an element and returns its estimated frequency after the insertion (i.e. the number of times the element was added to the filter).
        参数:
        element - element to add
        返回:
        estimated frequency of the element after insertion

      • addAndEstimateCount

      • removeAndEstimateCount

        public abstract long removeAndEstimateCount(byte[] element)
        Removes an element and returns its estimated frequency after the insertion (i.e. the number of times the element was added to the filter).
        参数:

        返回:
